title: Access the CDC PLACES API
text: package allows users seamlessly query Centers Disease Control Prevention’s (CDC) Population Level Analysis Community Estimates (PLACES) API. CDC’s website: >PLACES collaboration CDC, Robert Wood Johnson Foundation, CDC Foundation. PLACES provides health data small areas across country. allows local health departments jurisdictions, regardless population size rurality, better understand burden geographic distribution health measures areas assist planning public health interventions. > >PLACES provides model-based, population-level analysis community estimates health measures counties, places (incorporated census designated places), census tracts, ZIP Code Tabulation Areas (ZCTAs) across United States.

title: Access the CDC PLACES API
text: install latest development version run: install CRAN:

title: Access the CDC PLACES API
text: get_places — function query PLACES API. Arguments allows user specify geography (county/census tract/ZCTA/place), state, measure, release, geometry (include shapefiles). get_dictionary — function pull full list measures available PLACES data set.

title: Access the CDC PLACES API
text: view complete walk package, view vignette found . can also view pkgdown site .

what: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
text: Use function access CDC PLACES API data. Measures sourced Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System American Community Survey ACS.

title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
code: get_places(   geography = "county",   state = NULL,   measure = NULL,   county = NULL,   release = "2025",   geometry = FALSE,   cat = NULL,   age_adjust = NULL )

title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
text: geography level desired geography. Currently supports 'county', 'place', 'tract', 'zcta'. state Specify state desired data using two letter abbreviation. Supports multiple states desired. measure Specify measures data pull. Supports multiple measures desired. full list available measures, see function 'get_dictionary'. county Specify county desired data using full name county, capital letter. supported 'place' 'zcta' geography (use 'state' filter instead). release Specify year release PLACES data set. Currently supports years 2020-2025. geometry FALSE (default), return regular data frame PLACES data. TRUE, uses tigris package return sf data frame simple feature geometry 'geometry' column. cat Specify category measures return. Overrides argument 'measure'. Category ID must used . Options include 'DISABILT', 'HLTHOUT', 'HLTHSTAT', 'PREVENT', 'RISKBEH', 'SOCLNEED' (release 2024). see available categories corresponding variables, run get_dictionary. age_adjust queries county place level. TRUE, returns age-adjusted values.

title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
text: data frame contains observations measure geographic level.

title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ get_places(geography = "county", state = "MI", measure = "SLEEP", release = "2023") get_places(geography = "county", state = c("MI", "OH"), measure = c("SLEEP", "ACCESS2"), release = "2023") } # }

title: CDCPLACES 1.2.0
text: geography argument value 'census' renamed 'tract' clarity. Using 'census' now produces informative error directing users update code. default release year now "2025". Minimum R version bumped 4.1.0 (required base pipe |>).

title: CDCPLACES 1.2.0
text: Added support 2025 release year data. Added support 'place' geography (cities, towns, CDPs) across release years 2020–2025, including geometry age_adjust support. API endpoint URLs now stored internal data frame (api_urls) rather hardcoded, making easier add future release years. data-raw/DATASET.R now uses Socrata Discovery API programmatically discover PLACES endpoints, replacing manual Google Sheets approach.

title: CDCPLACES 1.2.0
text: Rewrote formatted_zctas(), measure_text(), format_query() use SQL operators instead chained LIKE/clauses, producing shorter efficient API queries. Increased ZCTA query row limits 50,000 5,000,000 prevent silent truncation large result sets. ZCTA queries exceed Socrata’s URL length limit (~7,000 characters) now automatically batched multiple smaller requests, preventing failures querying states many ZCTAs (e.g., Texas ~2,000 ZCTAs).

title: CDCPLACES 1.2.0
text: Fixed operator precedence bug check_multiples() check_multiples_cc() nrow(final_sum > 0) evaluated instead nrow(final_sum) > 0. Fixed check_api() test_check_api() crashing $ operator invalid atomic vectors connection-level error (DNS failure, timeout) occurred instead HTTP response. Fixed missing return() calls check_multiples() check_multiples_cc() caused values silently lost several code paths. Fixed geography validation order informative 'census' deprecation message shown instead generic error. Fixed base URL validation unsupported geography release year values produce clear error instead malformed API request. Guarded readline() calls check_multiples() check_multiples_cc() interactive() checks package longer hangs non-interactive contexts (Shiny, knitr, CI). Defaults including overlapping counties message. Replaced hardcoded column indices (places_out[8:11]) ZCTA path named column references, preventing incorrect conversions API schema changes. Fixed typo cat argument message (“overrideen” → “overridden”). Fixed geometry = TRUE using 2010 Census shapefiles 2024+ release data. PLACES switched 2020 Census geographies starting 2024 release, tract ZCTA GEOIDs longer matched. Geometry vintage now selected based release year. Fixed county filter using toupper() caused case-sensitive mismatch API’s title-case locationname values. Added to_title_case() helper normalize county names regardless user input casing.

title: CDCPLACES 1.2.0
text: Added 23 offline unit tests internal helpers input validators run CRAN (test-helpers.R). Rewrote API integration tests: replaced fragile outer /blocks skip_if_api_unavailable() inside test_that() proper skip reporting. Condensed API tests 60 year--combination tests 15 targeted tests deeper assertions (column names, filter correctness, numeric types, row counts). Added test coverage county, age_adjust, cat, get_dictionary(), ZCTA geography, graceful -internet failure. Removed Sys.sleep(10) calls duplicate test blocks.

title: CDCPLACES 1.2.0
text: Added \dontrun{} wrappers examples. Removed dead code: unused stop_quietly(), firstup(), commented-httr references. Cleaned stale entries globalVariables(). Fixed documentation: @param measure now correctly says “multiple measures” instead “multiple states”; parse_request() docstring updated httr2 curl.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.10
text: CRAN release: 2025-05-22 Increment version CRAN resubmission. Added skip_on_cran() test cases. Added \dontrun{} examples. Removed problematic CDC URL documentation. Updated minimum R version 4.1.0 DESCRIPTION.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.9
text: CRAN release: 2025-02-10 Edits logic check_api stop main function return null value api unable reached. Fixes typo test-get_places.R.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.8
text: CRAN release: 2024-09-18 Add newest release year (2024), updating API’s base URL. Added two new arguments: cat query specific category measures age_adjust return age adjusted rates set TRUE.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.7
text: CRAN release: 2024-08-26 Removed unnecessary dependencies improve performance. Fixes bug 1.1.6 related overlapping counties querying census tracts/counties.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.6
text: CRAN release: 2024-07-28 Added functionality query ZCTA-level data. available setting ‘geography’ argument ‘zcta’. Added mechanism check overlapping county names. useful querying levels data. Changed dependency used parse JSON data, improving performance querying data.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.5
text: CRAN release: 2024-03-14 Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Added argument ‘geometry’ return sf data frame shapefile requested geography. Added argument ‘county’ filter query results county name. Argument ‘geo’ changed ‘geography’ clarity.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.4
text: CRAN release: 2024-01-24 Updated version accepted CRAN January 24, 2024. Replaced ‘get_vars’ ‘get_dictionary’. new arguement returns data frame variable availability across years PLACES data.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-12-20 Initial version CDCPLACES published CRAN December 23, 2023. Included base functions ‘get_vars’ ‘get_places’.
